stage1.title: Adventurer of the Shimmering Woods
stage1.description: Complete a total of 10 Open World Time Trial Challenges in Avidya Forest, Lokapala Jungle, Ardravi Valley, Ashavan Realm, Vissudha Field, Lost Nursery, and Vanarana.

stage2.title: Adventurer of the Shimmering Woods
stage2.description: Complete a total of 20 Open World Time Trial Challenges in Avidya Forest, Lokapala Jungle, Ardravi Valley, Ashavan Realm, Vissudha Field, Lost Nursery, and Vanarana.

stage3.title: Adventurer of the Shimmering Woods
stage3.description: Complete a total of 40 Open World Time Trial Challenges in Avidya Forest, Lokapala Jungle, Ardravi Valley, Ashavan Realm, Vissudha Field, Lost Nursery, and Vanarana.
